raw: THE ENFORCEMENT OF SHARI’AH ACT, 1991 CONTETNS 1. Short title, extent and commencement 2. Definition 3. Supremacy of Shari’ah 4. Laws to be interpreted in the light of Shari’ah 5. Observance of Shari’ah by Muslim citizens 6. Teaching of, and training in, Shari’ah etc. 7. Islamization of education 8. Islamization of economy 9. Mass media to promote Islamic values 10. Protection of life, liberty, property, etc. 11. Elimination of bribery and corruption 12. Eradication of obscenity, vulgarity, etc. 13. Eradication of social evils 14. Nizam-i-adl 15. Bait-ul-Mal (Welfare Fund) 16. Protection of the ideology of Pakistan, etc. 17. Safeguard against false imputations, etc. 18. International financial obligations, etc. 19. Fulfillment of existing obligations 20. Rights of women not to be affected 21. Laws to be enacted by Majlis-e-Shoora (Parliament) and Provincial Assembly only 22. Rules THE ENFORCEMENT OF SHARI’AH ACT, 1991 ACT NO.
